body: UBA alert: Dem go stop your account for 24 hours. Make you confirm your account now for http://uba-secure-check.com make dem no block am.
Congratulation! You fit collect special tax rebate. Click dis link to claim within 12 hours: https://bit.ly/rebatesafrica
Dear customer, your SIM go off today. Confirm your NIN sharp sharp for http://mtn-verify.ng and put the OTP we send you.
